message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $14,500. Given its value to you, I believe this price represents a fair deal for both parties.
Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate your product, $14,500 is a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $13,000.  This price would be a great deal for both of us.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider it. For the sake of reaching an agreement, I propose to sell the product to you for $13,500.
